name: strict-authentication-service_backend
description: Strict Authentication Service - a production-grade, high-security authentication backend built using Node.js and Express.js. Designed for mission-critical systems like banking, fintech, and healthcare, this system uses short-lived JWTs stored in HttpOnly cookies, supports multi-device tracking, and implements token revocation, rate limiting, and cleanup via scheduled cron jobs. Built with modular structure, defensive programming, and real-world system design principles.
author: Yatharth Kumar Saxena
